entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
